Learning Today,
Leading the Space Sector Tomorrow

Empowering the next generation of sustainable space leaders through expert-led training, practical tools, and interdisciplinary learning.

Get Started

Developing Skills for a Responsible Space Future

Green Orbit Academy equips professionals, students, and organisations with the knowledge and tools needed to thrive in an evolving space economy. Our programmes blend evidence-based learning with practical application, ensuring every participant can turn insight into meaningful impact.

  • Hands-on training designed to build confidence and capability
  • Expert-led sessions connecting sustainability, innovation, and space industry practice
  • Engaging, accessible learning resources created for all stages of the space career journey

Through our workshops, courses, and learning pathways, we help you develop the skills to contribute to a safer, more sustainable, and more equitable space sector.
